name: Mushrun (itch) (Callial, Wynn Art, SuricatoGuerrilheiro, NekoGatoCat, ten-ten)
name_original: Mushrun (itch) (Callial, Wynn Art, SuricatoGuerrilheiro, NekoGatoCat, ten-ten)
description:
A simple grid-based survival horror game in which you harvest mushrooms on a procedural map to build a ladder and escape from "The Beast".

Created for Ludum Dare 52!

Developers
NekoGatoCat
Callial

Audio Production
B!SMRK
Ty1176

Artists
Marcelo Chiarastelli Rossato
Wynn Art
Emma (Tensei)
